title: What Color Is Your Parachute? A Practical Manual for Job-Hunters and Career-Changers
description: Thoroughly revised for 2007, a handy job-hunter's guide explains how to identify one's personal goals and interests and reveals how to apply that information toward obtaining satisfying employment, with tips on interviews, salary negotiation techniques, career searching online, and more, in a guide that reflects the current market. Simultaneous. 200,000 first printing.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles
